SD Card Error Expanded authentication module error There is no expanded authentication module in the machine. The SD card or the file of the expanded authentication module is broken. There is no DESS module in the machine.
•X No expanded authentication module •X Defective SD card •X Defective file in the authentication module •X No DESS module

1. Install the expanded authentication module. 2. Install the SD card. 3. Install the DESS module. 4. In the SSP mode set SP5-401-160 to 0. 5. In the SSP mode, set SP5-401-161 to 0. 6. Cycle the machine off/on. 7. Execute SP5-876-1 (security all clear). 8. If this is a mass-produced machine, replace the NV.
SD Card Error Version error The version of the expanded authentication module is not correct.
•X Incorrect module version
•X Install the correct file of the expanded authentication module.

SD Card Error. OSM user code file error The correct "usercode" file could not be found in the root folder of the SD card because the file is not present, or the existing file is corrupted or the wrong type file.
•X Create the usercode files with the User Setting Tool "IDissuer.exe" . •X Store the files in the root folder of the SD card. Note: Make sure the eccm.mod file is in the root folder of the SD card.

Controller start up error CTL •X After the machine was powered on, communication between the controller and the operation panel was not established, or communication with controller was interrupted after a normal startup. •X After startup reset of the operation panel, the attention code (FDH) or the attention acknowledge code (FEH) was not sent from the controller within 30 sec.. •X After the controller issued a command to check the communication line with the controller at 30-second intervals, the controller failed to respond twice.

•X Controller stalled •X Controller board installed incorrectly •X Controller board defective •X Operation panel connector loose, broken, or defective •X The controller did not completely shut down when the switch was turned off.
•X Check the setting of SP5-875-001. •X If this SP is set to "1 (OFF)", change it to "0 (ON)"

DSP Start Error Correct startup of DSP (Digital Signal Processing) could not be confirmed after three attempts. The CHOPIN module on the MCU handles the digital signal processing (DSP) for the operation of the vertical feed motor (paper feed), horizontal motor (carriage movement), and roll paper motor (roll units).
•X Cycle the machine off/on •X MCU defective (replace MCU).

DSP Communication Error Communication between DSP and MCU was lost during machine operation.
•X Cycle the machine off/on •X MCU defective

Log Data Error. 01 D Log Data Error 1 •X Damaged log data file in the HDD •X Initialize the HDD with SP5-832-004. 02 D Log Data Error 2 •X An encryption module not installed •X Replace or set again the encryption module. •X Disable the log encryption setting with SP9-730-004 ("0" is off.). 03 D Log Data Error 3 •X Invalid log encryption key due to defective NVRAM data •X Initialize the HDD with SP5-832-004. •X Disable the log encryption setting with SP9-730-004 ("0" is off.) 04 D Log Data Error 4 •X Unusual log encryption function due to defective NVRAM data •X Initialize the HDD with SP5-832-004. 05 D Log Data Error 5 •X Installed NVRAM or HDD which is used in another machine. •X Reinstall the previous NVRAM or HDD. •X Initialize the HDD with SP5-832-004. 99 D Log Data Error 99 •X Other than the above causes •X Ask your supervisor.

Printer application error. 00 No response when PM started up 01 Timeout error during PM operation 02 Working memory error 03 Cannot start filter process 04 Abnormal exit from filter process
An error was detected in the printer application program and operation cannot continue. •X Defective software •X Unexpected hardware resource (e.g., memory shortage)
1. Software err, cycle the machine off/on 2. Insufficient memory, add more memory
SC921
Printer font error CTL A necessary font is not found when starting up the printer application.
•X A requested font is not found in the SD card.
•X Cycle the machine off/on
SC925
NetFile function error. 00 HDD is defective 01 NetFile management file is broken

The NetFile file management on the HDD cannot be used, or a NetFile management file is corrupted and operation cannot continue. The HDDs are defective and they cannot be debugged or partitioned, so the Scan Router functions (delivery of received faxes, document capture, etc.), Web services, and other network functions cannot be used. HDD status codes are displayed below the SC code.

Procedure 1 If the machine shows SC codes for HDD errors (SC860 to SC865) with SC 925, do the recovery procedures for SC860 to SC865. Procedure 2 If the machine does not show one of the five HDD errors (SC860 to SC865), turn the machine power off and on. If this is not the solution for the problem, then initialize the NetFile partition on the HDD with SP5832-011 (HDD Formatting ¡V Ridoc I/F). NetFiles: Jobs printed from the document server using a PC and DeskTopBinder •X Before you initialize the NetFile partition on the HDD, tell the customer that: •X Received faxes on the delivery server will be erased •X All captured documents will be erased •X DeskTopBinder/Print Job Manager/Desk Top Editor job history will be erased •X Documents on the document server, and scanned documents, will not be erased. •X The first time that the network gets access to the machine, the management information must be configured again (this will use a lot of time). Before you initialize the Netfile partition with SP5832-011, do these steps: 1. Go into the User Tools mode and do "Delivery Settings" to print all received fax documents that are scheduled for delivery. Then erase them. 2. In the User Tools mode, do Document Management> Batch Delete Transfer Documents. 3. Do SP5832-011, then turn the machine power off and on. Procedure 3 If "Procedure 2" is not the solution for the problem, do SP5832-001 (HDD Formatting ¡V All), then turn the machine power off and on. SP5832-001 erases all document and address book data on the hard disks. Ask the customer before you do this SP code. Procedure 4 If "Procedure 3" is not the solution for the problem, replace the HDD.
SC990
Software performance error CTL The software makes an unexpected operation.
•X Defective software •X Defective controller •X Software error
•X Cycle the machine off/on. •X Reinstall the controller firmware •X Reinstall the main firmware
SC991
Software continuity error CTL The software has attempted to perform an unexpected operation. However, unlike SC 990, the object of the error is continuity of the software.
•X Software program error •X Internal parameter incorrect •X Insufficient working memory

•X This SC is not displayed on the LCD (logging only). 1. Execute SP7403 or print an SMC Report (SP5990) to read the history of the 10 most recent logged errors. 2. If you press the zero key on the operation panel with the SP selection menu displayed, you will see detailed information about the recently logged SC991, including the software file name, line number, and so on. Of these two methods, 1) is the recommended method, because another SC could write over the information for the previous SC.
SC992
Undefined Error (No SC Code) CTL An error not controlled by the system occurred (the error does not come under any other SC code).
•X Software defective •X Turn the machine power off and on. The machine cannot be used until this error is corrected. •X Re-install firmware
SC994
Operation Panel Management Records Exceeded

An error occurred because the number of records exceeded the limit for images managed in the service layer of the firmware. This can occur if there are too many application screens open on the operation panel.
No action required because this SC does not interfere with operation of the machine.
SC997
Application function selection error CTL The application selected by the operation panel key operated abnormally (No response, abnormal ending).
•X Software (including the software configuration) defective •X An option required by the application (RAM, DIMM, board) is not installed. •X Nesting of the fax group addresses is too complicated.

•X Check the devices necessary for the application program. If necessary devices have not been installed, install them. •X Check that application programs are correctly configured. •X For a fax operation problem, simplify the nesting of the fax group addresses. •X Take necessary countermeasures specific to the application program. If the logs can be displayed on the operation panel, see the logs.
SC998
Application start error CTL No applications start within a specified time after the power is turned on.
•X Loose connection of RAM-DIMM, ROM-DIMM •X Defective controller •X Software problem

•X Check the setting of SP5-875-001. If the setting is set to "1 (OFF)", change it to "0 (ON)". •X Check if the RAM-DIMM and ROM-DIMM are correctly connected. •X Reinstall the controller system firmware. •X Replace the controller board.
